definitions.definition: A transformation , such as one performed by magic .
A noticeable change in character , appearance , function , or condition .
A change in the form and often habits of an animal after the embryonic stage during normal development (e.g. the transformation of a caterpillar into a butterfly or a tadpole into a frog).
A change , usually degenerative , in the structure of a specific body tissue .

main_definition: A transformation , such as one performed by magic .
secondary_definitions: A noticeable change in character , appearance , function , or condition .

( biology ) A change in the form and often habits of an animal after the embryonic stage during normal development (e.g. the transformation of a caterpillar into a butterfly or a tadpole into a frog).
( pathology ) A change , usually degenerative , in the structure of a specific body tissue .
